title: 'The wheels are bad and were not needed..should have had a trolley instead'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. This is a fantastic product with lots of storage and you can plan out well ..just dont store lighter items below and heavy above(obvious reasons) I use it indoors. Just plan it this way easy and daily access on the top and graduate down the usage frequency to the lowest bin..  A few hickups like the top bin yellow flaps are a bit loose  This looses 1 star for... The lower section loses a lot of storage space due to the wheel which is of no use ( my thoughts) as an extensive user and as I use it "indoors only" my specific usage is much better served with the wheeled trolley that I made out of a board and wheels...  Overall I love it'

title: 'Missing lid. Broken Pivot'
body: 'I was not in town when the parcel arrived.... opened it only to find the lid on one of the storage areas missing... there is remains of the pivot pin. images attached.'

title: 'Perfect for all home improvement tools.'
body: 'This is perfect storage for all home improvement tools. Can easily carry it wherever you want especially if you have more than one house or farmhouse and like to tinker around. Very spacious and sturdy. I am very happy with mine. Good value for money.'

title: 'Looks good and seems VFM'
body: 'The pricing being so attractive
column5: got it but the outer box was supposedly damaged so they shipped it with just a plastic cover. It was intact inside on checking
column6: so took delivery. Normally I‚Äôd refuse. Coming to the top box
column7: it‚Äôs quite deep with metal lickings. Yellow part is disappointing with not much space and is only there for glamour. Last box is good. Side locks are all plastic. Wonder if they will last. Wanted the plastic overall to be thicker and more rugged. Plastic Wheels are just about functional. Not sure if they can carry any weight. No info booklet was inside. Lugging handle has to be first locked in place else it‚Äôs useless. So many compromises for attractive price! Using it for now. What to do? No other competitive product can match this right now. And Stanley is a brand. Bland and yellow combination looks good. That‚Äôs all'
